channel.title: Homes on Daniel Glauber
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Daniel Glauber

item.title: about
item.description:
Hi! I’m Daniel, a developer & designer.

I’m currently a student at Brown University concentrating in computer science. This past summer I worked as a software engineering intern at DocASAP, an online platform that enables patients to book appointments with the healthcare providers of their choice. In the past, I’ve worked with the team at HealthMap as a data science intern.

Besides health tech, I have a passion for education in computer science with a focus on inclusion for underrepresented minorities in the field.

item.title: teaching
item.description:
I am a teaching instructor for the following courses at University X:

  • CS101: An intro to computer science
  • CS102: An intro to computer science
  • CS103: An intro to computer science
  • CS104: An intro to computer science
  • CS105: An intro to computer science
  • CS106: An intro to computer science
  • CS107: An intro to computer science
